company_description: Copper is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform designed specifically for G Suite users, integrating seamlessly with Google Workspace to streamline sales and marketing processes.
seed_investors: Greyhound Capital, MMC Ventures, Sarus Select Capital
embedding_text: Copper is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform designed specifically for G Suite users, integrating seamlessly with Google Workspace to streamline sales and marketing processes.
